state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First of all, take a trip south. And then, go to the south. And then, make an attempt to take a trip west. Next, attempt to go to the west. And then, go north. Then, make an effort to travel west. And then, attempt to travel south.
